## Installation

```bash
pip install kling3-ai
```

## Usage

```python
from kling3_ai import get_info, get_platform_url

# Get platform information
info = get_info()
print(info)

# Get platform URL
url = get_platform_url()
print(url)  # https://kling3.net
```
